A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The anticipation for this sequel was high\, and many people thought this one would focus on the roots of The Jedi “religion”. Instead\, the movie is an utter mess. Hamill’s overacting is hard to watch\, and them there is the scene of Leia flying through space lime Mary Poppins. Only two characters are worth watching: Kylo Ren and Poe Dameron. Finn and Rey are just awful to watch.
